bitbucket-credentials.name: BitBucket Credentials
bitbucket-credentials.description: Store BitBucket credentials to interact with private BitBucket repositories. This block is part of the prefect-bitbucket collection. Install prefect-bitbucket with `pip install prefect-bitbucket` to use this block.
bitbucket-credentials.code_example:
Load stored BitBucket credentials:
```python
from prefect_bitbucket import BitBucketCredentials
bitbucket_credentials_block = BitBucketCredentials.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

fields.title: BitBucketCredentials
fields.description: Store BitBucket credentials to interact with private BitBucket repositories.

username.title: Username
username.description: Identification name unique across entire BitBucket site.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password to authenticate to BitBucket.

url.title: URL
url.description: The base URL of your BitBucket instance.

bitbucket-repository.name: BitBucket Repository
bitbucket-repository.description: Interact with files stored in BitBucket repositories. This block is part of the prefect-bitbucket collection. Install prefect-bitbucket with `pip install prefect-bitbucket` to use this block.
bitbucket-repository.code_example:
```python
from prefect_bitbucket.repository import BitBucketRepository

bitbucket_repository_block = BitBucketRepository.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

fields.title: BitBucketRepository
fields.description: Interact with files stored in BitBucket repositories.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: The URL of a BitBucket repository to read from in HTTPS format

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: An optional reference to pin to; can be a branch or tag.

bitbucket_credentials.title: Bitbucket Credentials
bitbucket_credentials.description: An optional BitBucketCredentials block for authenticating with private BitBucket repos.

BitBucketCredentials.title: BitBucketCredentials
BitBucketCredentials.description: Store BitBucket credentials to interact with private BitBucket repositories.

username.description: Identification name unique across entire BitBucket site.
